<title
    level="1"
    right="Item 5+"
    pfs="Standard"
>
[Heartening Missive](/Equipment.aspx?ID=2063)
</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Abjuration" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=2" />
<trait label="Consumable" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=36" />
<trait label="Magical" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=103" />
<trait label="Missive" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=485" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Treasure Vault](/Sources.aspx?ID=191) pg. 85 <sup>1.1</sup></row>

<row gap="medium">

**Usage** held in 1 hand

</row>

<row gap="medium">
<row gap="tiny"><row>**Activate**</row><actions string="Two Actions" /><row>envision, Interact</row></row>

 

 

 
</row>

</column>

---

You compose a _heartening missive_ by creating a short message or image intended to grant the recipient moral support. You must dedicate the missive to an individual creature you know and address it to their location (typically the settlement where you think they are). Once you finish composing the missive, it folds itself into the shape of an animal and [Flies](/Actions.aspx?ID=94) at a speed of 45 feet (about 15 miles per hour) toward the location for up to 24 hours. It alights near the recipient or in their hand. After Activating the missive, the recipient gets its benefit and becomes temporarily immune to all _heartening missives_ for 24 hours.

 If the missive fails to reach its recipient in 24 hours, it returns to its sender at the same pace, becoming non-magical when it arrives. After imparting or losing its magic, the missive remains as a normal document.

<column gap="tiny">

</column>

<title
level="2"
right="Item 6"
pfs="Standard"
>
Heartening Missive (Bull)
</title>

<traits>

</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Treasure Vault](/Sources.aspx?ID=191) pg. 85 <sup>1.1</sup></row>

**Price** 50 gp

<row gap="medium">

</row>

</column>

---

Folded into a bull, this missive grants the recipient a sense of solidity. The recipient gains a +1 item bonus to Fortitude saves for the next 24 hours.

<title
level="2"
right="Item 5"
pfs="Standard"
>
Heartening Missive (Butterfly)
</title>

<traits>

</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Treasure Vault](/Sources.aspx?ID=191) pg. 85 <sup>1.1</sup></row>

**Price** 25 gp

<row gap="medium">

</row>

</column>

---

Folded into a delicate butterfly, this missive grants the recipient a sense of grace and poise. Once during the next 24 hours, when the recipient fails a [Diplomacy](/Skills.aspx?ID=6) or [Performance](/Skills.aspx?ID=12) check, they can improve the result from a failure to a success or from a critical failure to a failure. This is a [fortune](/Traits.aspx?ID=76) effect.

<title
level="2"
right="Item 6"
pfs="Standard"
>
Heartening Missive (Rabbit)
</title>

<traits>

</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Treasure Vault](/Sources.aspx?ID=191) pg. 85 <sup>1.1</sup></row>

**Price** 50 gp

<row gap="medium">

</row>

</column>

---

Folded into a rabbit sitting on its haunches, this missive grants the recipient a sense of mischief and agility. The recipient gains a +1 item bonus to Reflex saves for the next 24 hours.

<title
level="2"
right="Item 6"
pfs="Standard"
>
Heartening Missive (Turtle)
</title>

<traits>

</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Treasure Vault](/Sources.aspx?ID=191) pg. 85 <sup>1.1</sup></row>

**Price** 50 gp

<row gap="medium">

</row>

</column>

---

Folded into a square-shelled turtle, this missive grants the recipient a firm sense of self and serenity. The recipient gains a +1 item bonus to Will saves for the next 24 hours.
